value:
Maybe I should ask Legault for some
tips on covert operations... Nah,
better not associate with his type.

I want to serve a lord who puts the
people first and does not give in
to selfish desires.

When I think of skill with a bow,
I think of Lady Louise. Ah, but
now is not the time to reminisce...

If I want to tail someone from above,
all I have to do is get on Hyperion...
so long as he's actually awake.

I do not consider myself the stealthy
sort. Even as a ninja, I prefer a fair
and straightforward fight.

I am Heath, a wyvern rider—well, at
present, a ninja. I have something
for you from $Nf.

You'd be proud of me, Commander
Vaida. I've finally found a place where
I can fight with a clear conscience.

Show me an opening, and I will strike
without hesitation! That's what a
ninja would do, right?

A ninja must be calm and collected
at all times. Flying off the handle
will get me nowhere.

I am proud, at last, to risk my life and
limb for a lord who's truly worthy
of my service.

I am Heath, a wyvern rider formerly
from Bern. If you're looking for a
ninja, I'm ready to serve.

I'm a mercenary now. That means
I'll do what my employer asks of
me—within reason, of course.$k$pI never expected to be recruited as a
ninja, though. I think Hyperion is
bewildered by it too.$k$pNinja earn a living in the shadows,
risking their lives to keep their
lords safe.$k$pI've...had bad luck with lords. As a
knight, all I ever wanted was to swear
fealty with a clean conscience.$k$pAskr has given me that, in a way.
Here, I can take pride in fighting
to protect the people.$k$pAs a ninja and a knight, you can count
on me to serve with devotion. Thank
you for inviting me to this festival.
I'll finish you off!
All part of the job.
For my lord!
Watch these arrows fly!
Now I've done it...
A festival from another world, huh? Makes sense... This outfit is something else.
Huh?! Oh, it's you. I didn't think you could sneak up on me.
Hyperion's a bit sluggish. He may have eaten too much. Come on, buddy, stay sharp!
Being stealthy on the back of a wyvern is no easy feat. Hyperion's not subtle.
Honestly, I have a hard time not breaking cover. I'm liable to say what I really think.
Commander Vaida... She could pull off an assassination without a hitch.
I could dig up your deepest, darkest secrets... Hah! Relax, I'm only kidding.
Right.
Let's apply some pressure.
I'll go silently.
